about_the_game:
It Takes a Village is a city-building RPG with a procedurally generated world inspired by Legend of Zelda and Animal Crossing. Gather resources, build your village, manage diverse villagers, craft weapons and armor, and explore a dynamic world—from lush forests with temples to mountainous tundras with caves and gems. Shape your village's destiny in this immersive adventure.

Explore a unique and changing world

Embark on an epic journey in It Takes a Village across diverse and procedurally generated biomes like deserts, tundras, and forests. Encounter unique enemies and explore intriguing places like caves, graveyards, bandit camps, and elaborate mazes. Gather resources to build and fortify your village and equip yourself to take on bigger and stronger foes.

Build and customize your village

Unleash your creativity in "It Takes a Village" as you personalize every detail of your village. With an extensive array of buildings, furniture, and cosmetics, transform your village into a living tribute to the countless adventures beyond its walls. Dive into the details by customizing pub atmospheres, workshop layouts, and even your own cozy personal house. Your village is a canvas—craft a unique haven that echoes the tales of your extraordinary adventures.

Craft and customize your unique character

Embrace your role as the hero by tailoring your avatar to your liking. Dive into a vast selection of armor and weapons, offering a multitude of cosmetic combinations and combat enhancements. Whether you prefer a stylish appearance or seek powerful gear for dangerous battles, the choices are yours to make. Equip yourself with the finest armor and fashion your own legendary look as you lead your village to glory.

Defend your village against intruders

As your village thrives, so do the dangers lurking beyond its borders. In "It Takes a Village," defend your hard-earned peace from waves of enemies seeking to destroy it. Strategically place archery towers and guardposts to fortify your village, then join your villagers on the frontlines to push back the darkness. Will you rise to the challenge and protect what you've built?

A small taste of what's to come

In the demo of It Takes a Village, you will be able play just the way you like.  If you want to go on an adventure, you can play through the first Act of the game and venture through the first 3 forest zones. You will build your village from the ground up, gathering resources, hunting for new schematics, and uncovering the secrets of the world you inhabit.

If you prefer something a bit more cozy, you can play through Creative Mode which will allow you to play without the need gather resources or search for schematics.  You will have all of the furniture, buildings, and floral arrangements you need to build a truly spectacular village.
